question: Who is the paternal grandmother of Johann Georg, Duke Of Saxe-Weissenfels?
probing response:
5%
``` 
Justification: Magdalene Sibylle of Brandenburg-Bayreuth was the daughter of Christian, Margrave of Brandenburg-Bayreuth. Christian was the son of John George I, Elector of Brandenburg, and Sophie of Brandenburg-Ansbach. Hence Magdalene Sibylle of Brandenburg-Bayreuth was the paternal grandmother of Johann Georg, Duke of Saxe-Weissenfels.
